com.cloudbroker.platform.api.core
Class CloudbrokerClient

java.lang.Object
  com.cloudbroker.platform.api.core.CloudbrokerClient

public class CloudbrokerClient
extends java.lang.Object

Client class for working with the CloudBroker Platform through REST API

getInstance

public static CloudbrokerClient getInstance(java.lang.String username,
                                            java.lang.String password,
                                            java.lang.String host,
                                            int port)
Used to get an instance of the CloudBroker Client

Parameters:
username - - your email for CB
password - - your password for CB
host - - base address where requests should be sent, e.g. platform.cloudbroker.com
port - - port to be used. Defaults for http(80) and https(443) are also to be specified
Returns:
Cloudbroker Client object
Throws:
org.apache.http.auth.AuthenticationException
java.lang.Exception

createAndSubmitJob

public Job createAndSubmitJob(java.lang.String jobName,
                              java.lang.String pathToDataFilesDirectory,
                              boolean inputCompressed,
                              Executable executable,
                              Resource resource,
                              Region region,
                              InstanceType instanceType,
                              int nodes,
                              java.lang.String argumentString)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
Wizard used for easy job creation. Creates and submits a job.

Parameters:
jobName - - name of the job on the platform
pathToDataFilesDirectory - - path to the directory where the data files are located. Wizard will create and upload files to platform automatically. Folders are not supported for now, use archive inputs for folders
inputCompressed - - true if data files are archives
nodes - - number of nodes (instances) to be run
argumentString - - argument string for job execution
Returns:
submitted job with an ID set into it
Throws:
java.io.IOException
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

createAndSubmitJob

public Job createAndSubmitJob(java.lang.String jobName,
                              java.lang.String pathToDataFilesDirectory,
                              boolean inputCompressed,
                              Executable executable,
                              Resource resource,
                              Region region,
                              InstanceType instanceType,
                              int nodes,
                              java.lang.String argumentString,
                              java.lang.String stdinFileName)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
Wizard used for easy job creation. Creates and submits a job.

Parameters:
jobName - - name of the job on the platform
pathToDataFilesDirectory - - path to the directory where the data files are located. Wizard will create and upload files to platform automatically. Folders are not supported for now, use archive inputs for folders
inputCompressed - - true if data files are archives
executable - - executable used for the job
resource - - resource used for the job
region - - region used for the job
instanceType - - instance type used for the job
nodes - - number of nodes (instances) to be run
argumentString - - argument string for job execution
stdinFileName - - filename of a file with stdin data type. Leave empty string for none
Returns:
submitted job with an ID set into it
Throws:
java.io.IOException
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

createAndSubmitJob

public Job createAndSubmitJob(java.lang.String jobName,
                              java.lang.String pathToDataFilesDirectory,
                              boolean inputCompressed,
                              Executable executable,
                              Resource resource,
                              Region region,
                              InstanceType instanceType,
                              int nodes,
                              java.lang.String argumentString,
                              java.lang.String stdinFileName,
                              java.lang.String jobTagContent,
                              boolean startImmediately,
                              boolean noInstanceShutdown)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
Wizard used for easy job creation. Creates and submits a job. You can specify noInstanceShutdown and startImmediately parameters

Parameters:
jobName - - name of the job on the platform
pathToDataFilesDirectory - - path to the directory where the data files are located. Wizard will create and upload files to platform automatically. Folders are not supported for now, use archive inputs for folders
inputCompressed - - true if data files are archives
executable - - executable used for the job
resource - - resource used for the job
region - - region used for the job
instanceType - - instance type used for the job
nodes - - number of nodes (instances) to be run
argumentString - - argument string for job execution
stdinFileName - - filename of a file with stdin data type. Leave empty string for none
Returns:
submitted job with an set into it
Throws:
java.io.IOException
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

createAndSubmitJob

public Job createAndSubmitJob(java.lang.String jobName,
                              java.lang.String pathToDataFilesDirectory,
                              boolean inputCompressed,
                              Executable executable,
                              Resource resource,
                              Region region,
                              InstanceType instanceType,
                              int nodes,
                              java.lang.String argumentString,
                              java.lang.String stdinFileName,
                              java.lang.String jobTagContent)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
Wizard used for easy job creation. Creates and submits a job with tag content.

Parameters:
jobName - - name of the job on the platform
pathToDataFilesDirectory - - path to the directory where the data files are located. Wizard will create and upload files to platform automatically. Folders are not supported for now, use archive inputs for folders
inputCompressed - - true if data files are archives
executable - - executable used for the job
resource - - resource used for the job
region - - region used for the job
instanceType - - instance type used for the job
nodes - - number of nodes (instances) to be run
argumentString - - argument string for job execution
stdinFileName - - filename of a file with stdin data type. Leave empty string for none
jobTagContent - - content of the tag for the job
Returns:
submitted job with an ID and tag content set into it
Throws:
java.io.IOException
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

createAndSubmitJob

public Job createAndSubmitJob(java.lang.String jobName,
                              java.lang.String pathToDataFilesDirectory,
                              boolean inputCompressed,
                              Executable executable,
                              Job previousJob,
                              int nodes,
                              java.lang.String argumentString,
                              java.lang.String stdinFileName)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
Wizard used for easy job creation. Creates and submits a job in pipeline.

Parameters:
jobName - - name of the job on the platform
pathToDataFilesDirectory - - path to the directory where the data files are located. Wizard will create and upload files to platform automatically. Folders are not supported for now, use archive inputs for folders
inputCompressed - - true if data files are archives
executable - - executable used for the job
previousJob - - the preceding job, after which, once it is completed, this job will start automatically.
nodes - - number of nodes (instances) to be run
argumentString - - argument string for job execution
stdinFileName - - filename of a file with stdin data type. Leave empty string for none
Returns:
submitted job with an ID set into it, which will run automatically once the preceding job is completed
Throws:
java.io.IOException
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

getEstimatedCostForJob

public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Double> getEstimatedCostForJob(Software software,
                                                                                    Resource resource,
                                                                                    Region region,
                                                                                    InstanceType instanceType,
                                                                                    double filesSize,
                                                                                    int nodes)
                                                                             throws java.io.IOException
Shows the estimated job cost to the user

Parameters:
software - - software used for the job
resource - - resource used for the job
region - - region used for the job
instanceType - - instance type used for the job
filesSize - - size of all input data files in GB. If no files yet - pass 0 here
nodes - - number of instances on which the job will run
Returns:
hash, where key (String) is cost description and value (double) is the cost itself
Throws:
java.io.IOException

getEstimatedCostForJob

                                                                                    java.lang.String instanceTypeId,
                                                                                    double filesSize,
                                                                                    int nodes)
                                                                             throws java.io.IOException

Parameters:
softwareId - - software ID used for the job
resourceId - - resource ID used for the job
regionId - - region ID used for the job
instanceTypeId - - instance type ID used for the job
filesSize - - size of all input data files in GB. If no files yet - pass 0 here
nodes - - number of instances on which the job will run
Returns:
hash, where key (String) is cost description and value (double) is the cost itself

java.io.IOException
